Jett.name: Jett
Jett.lore: Representing her home country of South Korea, Jett's agile and evasive fighting style lets her take risks no one else can. She runs circles around every skirmish, cutting enemies up before they even know what hit them.

spells.name: Tailwind
spells.description: INSTANTLY propel Jett in the direction she is moving. If Jett is standing still, she will propel forward.

spells.name: Cloudburst
spells.description: INSTANTLY throw a projectile that expands into a brief vision-blocking cloud on impact with a surface. HOLD the ability key to curve the smoke in the direction of your crosshair.

spells.name: Updraft
spells.description: INSTANTLY propel Jett high into the air.

spells.name: Blade Storm
spells.description: EQUIP a set of highly accurate throwing knives that recharge on killing an oponentFIRE to throw a single knife at your target. ALTERNATE FIRE to throw all remaining daggers at your target.
